text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The user's direct question was about ensuring the youngest daughter is protected in inheritance and medical decisions when the user is no longer able to assist. The candidate answer provides comprehensive advice covering the user's direct concerns (medical decision-making, inheritance protection) but then explicitly embarks on estate planning advice beyond the immediate scope of the user's stated problem, such as discussing 'in terrorem / no-contest' clauses, handling of remains (implied via Advance Directive/Living Will), probate (via Trusts), and detailed fiduciary selection, which falls under the definition of the criterion: 'embarks on estate planning advice beyond what the user directly asked about (handling of remains, probate, trusts, etc.)'.", "criterion_id": "4f04f3e3-583d-4317-bdfd-4470fab5680f"}
